-- | An API for generating TIMBER style reactive objects.
--   
--   An API for generating reactive objects, as used in the TIMBER
--   programming language.
@package io-reactive
@version 0.1.1


-- | An API for generating reactive objects, as used in the TIMBER
--   programming language.
module Control.Concurrent.Reactive
type Action s = s -> IO s
type Request s a = s -> IO (s, a)
reactiveObjectIO :: state -> (ThreadId -> (forall r. Request state r -> IO r) -> (Action state -> IO ()) -> IO () -> object) -> IO object
